title: International tourism spending in Portugal 2012 to 2028
summary: Overall Spending in billion euros has increased over the Year.
Spending in billion euros is slightly increasing from 2013 to 2014.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2013 and 2014.
Maximum Spending in billion euros, about 13.9 was reported at Year 2014
The lowest Spending in billion euros, of value 12.8 was reported at Year 2013
